channel.title: Canned cause marl is cruel (Turbo Popcorn, with roles!)
channel.description:
:popcorn: Popcorn Mafia :popcorn: - Rules - Normal forum rules
Mechanics! - If a town shoots a town the person with the gun dies and the town gets it, if they shoot mafia mafia dies and they gat another shot (exceptions may apply see rules) Mafia chooses who gets the gun first. The person with the gun MUST shoot someone in 20 minutes from getting it or they shoot themselves and mafia decide who gets the gun next.
Roles! Roles can be ANY alignment - >[color=white]Vanilia[/color] >- >You have nothing to help you but your voice! Use it well
>[color=white]Time Traveler[/color] >- >While you are not time traveling to the ages of the dinosaurs and trying to out run them (spoiler alert you almost die a lot) you spend your time traveling time and space searching for the perfect popcorn! You have two abilties that you can use. They are all one use. > >Speed Up Time-You accelerate time up by 10 minutes, if there are less then 10 minutes in the day you leave the timer at 3 minutes. >Slow Down-You slow down time adding an extra 10 minutes to the clock.
>[color=white]The Doctor[/color] >- >You are the greatest doctor who ever lived, because you only heal people for popcorn. It's a great trade off, even though you don't actually have a medical license Once per day, you may PM me a person. They will be unable to be affected by any abilities today. Unfortunately you are unable to be targeted by another doctor on the day you use this ability due to eating popcorn. As well if the target is poisoned they will be healed.
>[color=white]The Roleblocker[/color] >- >Once each day you may PM me a person. They will be prevented from using any day abilities. This does NOT include using the gun.
>[color=white]The Redirector[/color] >- >Twice per game, you may PM me two people. All day abilties used on them will be swapped with the other. This includes the gun. (You can also say swap x and y D2, on D1. This is to help having to use it right before everyone else's uses it so you can delay the effect)
>[color=White]The Poisoner[/color] >- >Once per game you may msg me a person you want to poison, they will be notified and die in two days.
Rolelist! - If we get 9 people then 1.Town 2.Town 3.Town 4.Town 5.Town 6.Town 7.Mafia 8.Mafia 9.Mafia
Sign Ups! - 1. 2. 3. .....
This game will start at [date=2018-12-21 time=13:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]
